overview: A young artist tries to realize herself through creativity but encounters a total misunderstanding from society. Confused and overwhelmed by her failures she tries to distance herself from people. The girl gets lost in a secret world of the subconscious. Once there she finds something incredible - a vital energetic "Faisis". This energy brings her to finding her place in the world and mission. Furthermore, it helps her to understand why people do what they do. She returns to the real world with this new knowledge and shares it with the people.
title: Dispersion
